topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53e9e6526368720601e00000#post_53e9e6526368720601e00000

Oh right I remember that Spike he's so fucking cute, compared to the other versions but I like the baddass kind of Spike in that anthro pic from a while back I can't recall who did it, but it had Spike with green mow-hawk like hair which looked pretty okay. 

Also I think that shipping Spike with all the mares is probably one of the best kind of ships in the fandom, its just so funny. And adorable at times when people try making it work. XD 

But what I'd like the most is to have a really epic and sad fanfic of Spike. Heck I've been trying to find the best means of killing him and making him into this epic lich who goes around seeking revenge.
